thoughts: Gets scared by a shadow above the water
Squabbles with some other larvae over a flake of food
Nibbles on the fingers someone stuck in the spawning pool
Rotates a leaf nobody's eaten yet with their legs
Gets scared by a cub splashing in the water
Recognises r_c's fingers in the water and swims over
Doesn't recognise r_c's fingers in the water and darts away, frightened
